\r\n

Thanks for putting time into setting this up. I get the idea of using metadata for easier search, and it definitely makes sense. But if we add metadata, shouldn’t the search be better even without changing the folder structure we’re all used to? This way, we’d get the benefit of both — faster search and the familiar locations we already navigate.

Maybe we can keep the folder order while still using metadata to improve search?
